params.account: The address to get the balance of

returns._0: The number of CErc20 tokens held by the address

params.account: The address to get the underlying balance of

returns._0: The underlying balance of the address

params.amount: The amount of underlying tokens to borrow

returns._0: The result of the borrow operation (0 for success, error code otherwise)

params.account: The address to get the borrow balance of

returns._0: The current borrow balance of the address
The current borrow interest rate per block, scaled by 1e18
The current exchange rate scaled by 1e18

params.amount: The amount of the borrower's debt to repay
params.borrower: The address of the borrower to liquidate
params.collateral: The address of the asset to seize as collateral

returns._0: The result of the liquidation operation (0 for success, error code otherwise)

params.amount: The amount of underlying tokens to supply

returns._0: The result of the mint operation (0 for success, error code otherwise)

params.amount: The amount of CErc20 tokens to redeem

returns._0: The result of the redeem operation (0 for success, error code otherwise)

params.amount: The amount of underlying tokens to redeem

returns._0: The result of the redeem operation (0 for success, error code otherwise)

params.amount: The amount of underlying tokens to repay

returns._0: The result of the repay operation (0 for success, error code otherwise)
The current supply interest rate per block, scaled by 1e18

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the current balance of a specified address's CErc20 tokens

balanceOfUnderlying(address).notice: Get the underlying balance of an address, considering the current exchange rate

borrow(uint256).notice: Borrow a specified amount of underlying tokens from the protocol

borrowBalanceCurrent(address).notice: Get the current borrow balance of an address, including interest

borrowRatePerBlock().notice: Get the current borrow interest rate per block

exchangeRateCurrent().notice: Get the current exchange rate between CErc20 tokens and underlying tokens

liquidateBorrow(address,uint256,address).notice: Liquidate a borrower's collateral when they are undercollateralized

mint(uint256).notice: Mint new CErc20 tokens by supplying underlying tokens to the protocol

redeem(uint256).notice: Redeem a specified amount of CErc20 tokens in exchange for the underlying asset

redeemUnderlying(uint256).notice: Redeem a specified amount of underlying tokens by burning CErc20 tokens

repayBorrow(uint256).notice: Repay a specified amount of the borrowed underlying tokens

supplyRatePerBlock().notice: Get the current supply interest rate per block
